SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT25
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is sent to the user acknowledging successful completion of an 05 Quit Command.
From: FIN To: User
Notes When the QUIT command is recognised by the system, it is always positively acknowledged and the session is closed. If the time and date specified in the QUIT command are incorrect, they are ignored and signalled to the user in field 401: <error-code-l/q>.
If there is an ISN error, the QUIT is safe stored under the expected ISN, the session is closed, and the user is made aware of this by the value of field 401.
The QUIT acknowledgement contains the following session information: • Session Number of the FIN session just closed • date and time this FIN session was opened • date and time this FIN session was closed • a reason code, indicating the reason for the closure • number of messages sent in this FIN session • number of messages received in this FIN session • first and last ISN used in this FIN session • first and last OSN used in this FIN session

SystemField.Name: session-info
SystemField.description:
Session information, including:
a) session number
b) date session opened
c) time session opened
d) date session closed
e) time session closed
f) reason for closure
g) quantity of messages sent
h) quantity of messages received
i) first ISN
j) last ISN
k) first OSN
l) last OSN

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: session-info
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Session information, including:
a) session number
b) date session opened
c) time session opened
d) date session closed
e) time session closed
f) reason for closure
g) quantity of messages sent
h) quantity of messages received
i) first ISN
j) last ISN
k) first OSN
l) last OSN

Validation.actionmessage: "Invalid Session-Opened-Date '" + $value + "'. session-opened-date should be in the format yyMMdd."
"Invalid Session-Opened-Time '" + $value + "'. session-opened-time should be in the format HHmm."
"Invalid Session-Closed-Date '" + $value + "'. session-closed-date should be in the format yyMMdd."
"Invalid Session-Closed-Time '" + $value + "'. session-closed-time should be in the format HHmm."

SystemField.Name: error-code-l/q
SystemField.description:
Error code for Logout/Quit, where:
a) 01 = incorrect time/day
b) 02 = TNG trailer missing
c) 03 = ISN error
See SWIFTNet FIN Error Codes module for the full set of error codes.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: error-code-l/q
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Error code for Logout/Quit, where:
a) 01 = incorrect time/day
b) 02 = TNG trailer missing
c) 03 = ISN error
See SWIFTNet FIN Error Codes module for the full set of error codes.

Validation.actionmessage: "Invalid Error Code '"+$value+"'. Valid Error Codes are : 01, 02, 03."
